faq.title: Got
faq.subtitle: We've got all the answers you need (and probably some you didn't know you wanted)

free.question: Is TikViddl really 100% free forever?
free.answer: Absolutely! We believe great tools should be accessible to everyone. No hidden fees, no premium tiers, no BS. Download unlimited videos completely free, always.

software.question: Do I need to download sketchy software?
software.answer: Never! TikViddl runs entirely in your browser. No downloads, no installations, no malware risks. Just pure, clean downloading power at your fingertips.

watermarks.question: Will my videos have those annoying watermarks?
watermarks.answer: Not a chance! Every video you download through TikViddl comes completely clean - no watermarks, no logos, just pure content ready for whatever you need.

quality.question: What's the video quality like?
quality.answer: We deliver the absolute best quality available - typically crystal-clear HD (720p) or even higher, depending on the original video. No compression, no quality loss.

legal.question: Is downloading TikTok videos actually legal?
legal.answer: For personal use? Generally yes! Just remember to respect creators' rights and don't redistribute content without permission. When in doubt, ask the creator first.

speed.question: How crazy fast are we talking here?
speed.answer: Most downloads complete in 3-8 seconds flat. Our servers are optimized for speed, so you'll spend more time watching than waiting.

privacy.question: Do you spy on my downloads or store my videos?
privacy.answer: Absolutely not! We process everything in real-time and deliver directly to you. Zero storage, zero tracking, zero invasion of your privacy.

private.question: Can I download private or restricted videos?
private.answer: Nope - we can only access publicly available content. Private videos stay private, and we respect creators' privacy settings completely.
